name: Allie Brandt Lanes
description: Allie Brandt Lanes is your home for family FUN and family entertainment in Lockport, NY.

name: Avenue Pub
description: Nice place, small makes good food and with some pretty good prices for a bar. Just know it doesn't say Avenue Pub it Says THE PUB in big black letters.

name: Brando's Pizza & Wings
description: At Brando's Pizza & Wings, our pizza restaurant is proud to be North Tonawanda, New York’s choice for delicious pizza, wings and subs

name: Buffalo Pizza & Ale House
description: Quality and variety are the cornerstones of our business and we are continually adding quality offerings to our menu of services to the delight of our customers. All of our menu items are made from the highest-quality ingredients.

name: Buffalo RiverWorks
description: Buffalo RiverWorks the city’s newest premier waterfront, boating, sports, music and entertainment destination located along the banks of the Buffalo River.

name: Colosso Taco & Pizza Express
description: Colosso Taco & Subs! If you’re looking for a safe, clean place to enjoy great Mexican food morning, noon, and night, you’ve found it.

name: Darien Lake Amusement Park
description: Conveniently located on picturesque Darien Lake, the Lodge on the Lake is just steps away from our theme park. Come and go as you please throughout your stay

name: Dean's World of Hollywood Entertainment
description: Your #1 source for merchandise from Movies, TV, and Music and Pinball!!

name: District Barber Shop
description: We make people LOOK GOOD and FEEL GOOD

name: Dwyer Ice Arena
description: Dwyer Arena is a two pad ice facility located on the beautiful Niagara University campus. The arena is home to the Niagara University Mens Division 1 hockey program and the Niagara Junior Purple Eagles youth hockey organization.

name: Electric Avenue Cafe
description: “Music gives a soul to the universe, wings to the mind, flight to the imagination, and life to everything.”  ― Plato

name: Expo Market
description: An upscale downtown food hall in direct response to the local community's growing interest in food culture, craft beverages, and communal gathering places. The food hall is called EXPO—a nod to the Pan-American Exposition in 1901.

name: Frizzy's Bar
description: Dive Bar in Buffalo, New York

name: Gypsy Parlor
description: Gypsy Parlor is located in the heart of the West Side of Buffalo, we feature local favorites and flavors from around the world. A play on "regional" cuisine boosts some of the West Side's favorites like pastelillos and samosas.

name: Jim's Truck Plaza
description: Good food good prices, and fast polite service

name: John & Mary's
description: Open 7 days a week, take-out, dine in, or have it delivered! Be a guest at your next party and let John & Mary's do the cooking.  Whether it's a single sub tray, pizza, or large party package, John & Mary's is perfect for business meetings, parties, tai

name: John & Mary's
description: John and Marys Pizza has been a buffalo tradition since 1952, serving up the best pizza subs and wings made from quality ingredients.

name: Laundry Lounge
description: Roomy, convenient, well lit, 24 hrs, always attended.

name: Leisure Rinks
description: Leisure Rinks is the only "private" ice rink built in Western New York that has operated continuously since inception

name: Manor Lanes
description: Welcome to Manor Lanes, one of New York’s best bowling alleys. We are family owned and operated, founded in 1974. We offer individuals, leagues, and clubs bowling, sand volleyball, and delicious food.

name: Midway State Park
description: Located on the shores of beautiful Chautauqua Lake, Midway State Park is a family treasure. Originally established in 1898 as a trolley park, Midway State Park is one of the oldest continually operating amusement parks in the nation.

name: Misuta Chow's
description: Misuta Chow’s will be the first restaurant and bar establishment in Buffalo highlighting the 80s pop culture and classic arcade games with a Tokyo City themed décor and Japanese Street Food.

name: Odie's
description: Great wings, good people, good prices. A bit of "Old Tonawanda"

name: Pan-American Grill & Brewery
description: The Pan American Grill & Brewery was created with inspiration from The Pan-American Exposition was a World's Fair held in Buffalo, New York, United States, from May 1 through November 2, 1901.

name: Pearl Street Grill & Brewery
description: Pearl Street Grill & Brewery has opened all four floors and the basement for a total of 9 bars and countless tap handles – all of which are serving house-made craft beer from holding tanks in the basement.

name: Pocketeer Billiards and Bar
description: Pocketeer Billiards, the largest pool hall and pinball collection in Western New York.

name: Resurgence Brewing Co.
description: We work hard, but we also have fun. Heck, we have fun while working hard. Our brewers start early and work late, dedicated to making great, consistent, creative beers.

name: Say Cheese Pizza Co./ The Comic Book Cafe
description: Say Cheese is one of the most unique restaurants in Western NY. In addition to our award-winning pizza and delicious food, we have a comic book store in the middle of the restaurant!

name: Shorts Bar & Grill
description: We have been here since 1976 serving up great drinks and food. Over the years, our patrons have become our family making this one of the most comfortable places to visit for a drink, quick meal or to reconnect with friends.

name: TF Brown's Restaurant
description: This full service family restaurant is the concept of brothers Ben and Rick Mancuso who closed the original Mancuso’s Restaurant December 31st 1994 and on March 16th 1995 opened this fun, family sports themed restaurant that they operate today.

name: The Barrel Factory
description: The landmark, newly-restored, 115-year-old historic factory in Buffalo's legendary ​Old First Ward, featuring the Lakeward Spirits craft distillery, Pressure Drop Brewing craft brewery, Buffalo's Best Cucina restaurant, and much more

name: The Laundry Basket Too
description: Friendly service, comfy seating.quality all around.

name: Transit Lanes
description: For bowling, parties, corporate events and more, we're located just outside of Buffalo in Williamsville, NY. Featuring Keglers Sports Bar and Kitchen.  With 52 lanes of bowling, we are your family entertainment center.
